briefdescription.para: Initialize the digital to analog converter.

parameterdescription.para: Flags: DAC_CH1: Enable channel 1 DAC_CH2: Enable channel 2

simplesect.title: Side Effects:
simplesect.para: May set PA4 or PA5 to INPUT_ANALOG

briefdescription.para: Write a 12-bit value to the DAC to output.

simplesect.title: Side Effects:
simplesect.para: May change pin mode of PA4 or PA5

briefdescription.para: Digital to analog converter header file.
